Captain James Kirk was in his chair, Commander Spock was standing at the Science Station, Lieutenant Hikaru Sulu was positioned at the helm, Ensign Pavel Chekov was seated next to him at navigation, Lieutenant Nyota Uhura was working at the Communications Array, and Yeoman Janice Rand was standing behind Captain Kirk, awaiting commands from him.

Nothing much had happened since they had received their assignment; they were expecting this to be a fairly ordinary day. However, Uhura and Rand were eagerly looking forward to something else.

Before long, the speaker on the bridge came on and Nurse Christine Chapel's voice was heard: "Lieutenant Uhura, Yeoman Rand, please report to sickbay for a routine checkup."

That was what the two women had been waiting for. Both of them casually moved away from their posts and proceeded to the turbolift. Lieutenant Hadley took over for Uhura at comm. When the turbolift doors opened, the women entered it and waited for it to close.

Once it started moving, they dropped their emotionless display, looked at each other, and grinned.

"You think she finally got it?" asked Uhura.

"Considering that we already had our routine checkup last week, I'm certain of it," replied Rand.

A few minutes later, the two women in red had arrived in Sickbay. As usual, Dr. Leonard "Bones" McCoy and his assistant Nurse Christine Chapel were there. However, Commander Montgomery Scott and a number of his crew in the engineering department were there as well. A conduit had ruptured down in the engine room, injuring several of them. Scott had not been hurt in the rupture; he was simply there to assure himself of the well-being of his men.

Nurse Chapel noticed Uhura and Rand entering the room. Once they did, she told McCoy "Doctor, I would like to give Yeoman Rand and Lieutenant Uhura their health exams now."

"That might be difficult right now, Christine," Dr. McCoy told his assistant, "Sickbay's already crowded enough as it is."

"Sure, that's acceptable," McCoy responded.

Chapel grinned and said "Thank you, sir. I just need to get my equipment and then we'll be out of your hair."

She went into her office, retrieved a large black box, and then told the other two women "Come with me, please."

The three ladies left Sickbay and headed towards Chapel's quarters. Once they arrived there, Chapel instructed the computer to seal off the door. Then she placed the black box on a counter, opened it, and removed two packages of adult diapers; one for cloth, one for disposable.

Deanna Troi stood in the main transporter room of the USS Enterprise-D. She was waiting to greet her mother, the flamboyant Betazoid ambassador Lwaxana Troi.

Normally, Deanna would feel somewhat embarrassed or exasperated to have her mother around the ship, given her previous history and behavior around the others. But this time, she was coming aboard to spend some personal time with her daughter.

When Deanna was seven years old, her Human father Ian Troi died. This devastated both her and her mother. Deanna initially felt she would never be happy again. She began have accidents at night for no apparent reason other than being struck with grief.

Lwaxana decided to put her daughter into diapers at night for a short time until she could regain her control. Deanna agreed to this arrangement.

A few weeks later, Deanna stopped have accidents. However, she had also begun to develop an interest in the diapers she wearing. She hesitantly told her mother about this, and instead of being disgusted, Lwaxana was pleased to find out; her daughter had found some solace in a simple garment.

Lwaxana continued diapering her daughter day and night often for several years after that. Deanna did not wear them every day, but she always savored her time in diapers. She and her mother were actually able to bond better when she was in diapers than when she was out of them.

When Deanna turned eighteen, she entered Starfleet. Subsequently, she saw her mother less and less. But every once in a while, the two of them would meet up and spend some quality time together. Sometimes, that quality time would involve diapers.

A few days earlier, Deanna had spoken with her mother on a long-range communication line and Lwaxana had informed her that she would be paying her a visit. Deanna was initially uncertain how to respond, but then Lwaxana assured her that this visit was explicitly for her and not for Captain Picard, Commander Riker, or anyone else on the ship.
Now that Lwaxana was here, Deanna could finally indulge herself. Of course, she could always diaper herself, but it just wasn’t the same thing as having her mother do it for her. She had once experimented with the Holodeck, but it still wasn’t the same thing to her; a hologram could never utilize the grace and care Lwaxana always employed.

Aside from Chief Miles O’Brien at the transporter pad, the only other person in the room was Captain Jean-Luc Picard.

“Mrs. Troi is ready to beam aboard, sir,” O’Brien remarked.

Picard just stated in his usual business tone “Bring her up, Mr. O’Brien.”

The Chief did as he was ordered and a few moments later, Lwaxana appeared on the pad. As usual, her manservant Mr. Homn was with her. In addition to Lwaxana’s usual suitcases, Mr. Homn was carrying a rather large bag over his shoulder. One he did not usually carry. Deanna had a good idea as to what was inside of it.

“How lovely to know you’re just as excited as ever to see me, Jean-Luc,” Lwaxana remarked deviously, talking to the Captain, “But you simply must learn to control those thoughts; they’re quite unprofessional for someone of your standing!”

Captain Picard pretended to be amused and replied “Indeed, not my dear.”

Lwaxana quickly turned away from him and looked to her daughter. She smiled at her lovingly and said “I’m glad you’re not reluctant to have me back, darling.”

“Of course I’m not, mother,” said Deanna, “Why would I be?”

“Oh, you never know what could come up,” Lwaxana stated in response, “Now, shall I be shown to my quarters?”

“Of course, madam,” stated Picard, “Come with me to-“

“I appreciate the gesture, Jean-Luc,” Lwaxana interrupted him, “But I’d prefer to have Deanna show me to them. She and I have… something of a personal matter to see to.”

“Very well,” Picard agreed, “If you need me, I’ll be on the bridge.”

With that, Picard left the transporter room. Chief O’Brien followed him close behind. This left Deanna alone with Lwaxana and Mr. Homn.

“So, little one, where would you like to go?” asked Lwaxana.

Then she heard giggling behind her.
Seven of Nine slowly looked over her shoulder and saw Q's son, Q Junior standing on the opposite side of the room. He smirked and said "Hello, Seven of Nine. I love your new uniform?"
"What do you mean?" she inquired in slight confusion, "This is one of my standard catsuits I have always worn. It is not new."

Q Junior snickered and walked a little closer, saying "I've been studying the habits and tendencies of numerous biological lifeforms. I was quite amazed that so many species can develop strange fetishes. Bolians, Cardassians, Bajorans, Romulans, Klingons, Ferengi, and even the Vulcans. However, the Humans have the most interesting fetishes of them all. After examining weight gain, shrinking, growing, feet, and many others, I arrived at something known as 'infantilism.' That is the fetish one has when they have a desire to wear diapers and behave or be treated like a baby. Only the diaper-wearing part caught my attention, though, so I decided to explore it a little more. But I wanted an actual person to do so."
"And why me?" asked Seven of Nine.
"Because you're the sexist woman I've ever met!" Q Junior responded cockily.
Seven of Nine responded nonchalantly "I am flattered by that, Q. But I am a grown woman. I cannot strut around the ship in nothing but diapers all day long."
"But you look so cute in them!" he insisted.
"Does your father know what you're doing?" Seven of Nine questioned him.

1432312.content:
It was a fine day for the crew of the Starship Voyager. The vessel had landed on a tropical planet which was seemingly uninhabited. Captain Janeway had given the crew a much needed shore leave.

The vast majority of the crew took advantage of their environment and decided to spend their time outside on the beaches. They wanted to get some sun, catch some waves, and mingle with friends.

There were only two people in the entire crew who remained on board. The ex-Borg Seven of Nine, and Naomi Wildman, daughter of Ensign Samantha Wildman. Seven felt that vacationing would have been a waste of time, and Naomi simply preferred to stay on the ship.

After a long day of examining the ship's auxiliary systems, Seven of Nine decided to take a break. When she finally wrapped up her work, she headed over to the Wildmans' room to meet up with her young friend.

Naomi had been alone reading, playing, and studying all day long. When she heard the door open, she eagerly looked up to see who her visitor was.

"Hi, Seven," she greeted her friend sweetly, "What are you doing here?"

"I just finished overhauling the power network on all fifteen decks," Seven responded with no emotion, "I have decided to rest before continuing with my work. I assumed you would like some company."

"Well, you assumed right," Naomi remarked, "I think my Mom is going to camp out on the beaches tonight. So will everybody else, as far as I can tell. You're welcome to stay with me until tomorrow morning. I haven't had company in while."

"You would not mind if I lingered here?" Seven of Nine queried, "The Doctor advised me to spend some time around company to help me better my social skills. And although I have no complaints about my work habits, sometimes my duties can be very tiring. I'm hoping to find a way to relax."

"Sure, I don't mind," Naomi assured her. She quickly got an idea and offered "How about I help you relax?"

"Really? How?" Seven asked.
1432312.title: To help her relax

14323121.content:
"Do you still have any memories of your childhood at all?" Naomi asked curiously.

"Well, how about we give you a childhood!" suggested a very excited Naomi.

"I am not sure I understand what you are entailing," Seven stated, "What do you mean by that?"

"Oh, I thought it was obvious," Naomi cheekily pronounced,"What I mean is I'll treat you like a baby! I'll diaper you, change you, feed you, burp you, etc."

Seven of Nine raised an eyebrow in surprise and stated in astonishment "I beg your pardon, Naomi, but did I just mishear you? Diapers? Seriously? I am a grown woman with the cumulative knowledge of thousands of individuals. I assist in running this ship for a living. You cannot possibly be serious..."

"Do I look like I'm joking?" Naomi barked, bringing a sudden and very serious look on her face, "You are gonna stay here and have a childhood whether you like it or not!"

She calmly hugged her daughter and told her "It's alright, sweetie. We'll fix this problem."
Naomi slowly stopped crying and looked up at her mother, asking her "How, Mom?"
Samantha took the process one step at a time. She first decided to
145231121.title: She is having accidents

1452311211.content:
She decided to give Naomi a bath.
"Let's just get you out of those wet clothes first. I'll draw a bath."
"Okay, Mom," Naomi smiled sweetly at her mother.
Samantha went into the bathroom and started the water. After using the computer to adjust it to the proper temperature, she walked back out into the bedroom. She told her daughter "Here, let me help you."
She knelt down to Naomi's level and unfastened her jumper. After letting it drop to the ground, she helped Naomi out of her shirt, shoes, socks, pants, and shirt. After helping her out of her underwear, she led Naomi over to the bathroom and helped her into the tub.
"You know where everything is, right?" said Samantha.
"Yep, the red bottle's shampoo, the blue bottle's conditioner," Naomi confirmed.
"I'll be in the next room," stated Samantha, "Call me when you're done."
Naomi nodded and began to clean herself with the soap. Samantha walked out to the bedroom and sat down at the table. She rubbed her forehead in frustration. So far, there was no logical explanation as to how or why Naomi was suddenly having accidents. She was a Human-Ktarian hybrid, and given the fact that she matured as quickly as a normal Ktarian, she should have as much control over her body as one as well.
The way Samantha saw it, she had one of two options: Consult The Doctor, or get Naomi some... protection.
After thinking for a moment, she decided to
1452311211.title: Give her a bath

choices: told her daughter to come out
14523112112.content:
Samantha sighed, stood up, and made her way over to the replicator on the other side of the room. She stated "Computer."
There was a beeping sound and the monotonous voice said "Ready."
Samantha ordered the computer "Replicate a diaper."
The computer responded "Specify color: red, yellow, orange, green..."
"White, please," Samantha interrupted.
The computer stated "Specify measurements."
She answered "Size it to fit Naomi Wildman."
Once more, the computer remarked "Specify: cloth or disposable?"
Samantha rolled her eyes. Sometimes, the computer could become very incessant and even a little annoying. She just told it "Disposable. Replicate one white disposable diaper to fit my daughter Naomi Wildman!"
There was another beeping sound and a flash of particles. A moment later, a disposable diaper appeared on the replicator.
Samantha slowly picked it up and examined it. It was indeed larger than the type of diapers she had used on Naomi when she was a baby. She just smiled at the thought of how her daughter had grown so much.
She inhaled the scent of the diaper. It smelled very nice, like baby powder. It also made a distinct crinkling sound as she rubbed her hands over it.
A moment later, she heard Naomi call out "Mom, I'm done!"
Samantha
14523112112.title: Get a diaper

145231121122.content:
Samantha tossed the diaper onto her bed and went to get Naomi. She grabbed her towel, helped her daughter out of the tub, and dried her off. Naomi giggled as this happened; she was a little ticklish.
As Samantha finished drying off her half-Ktarian daughter, she told her "Naomi, I believe I may have found a potential way for us to help you control these accidents of yours."
Naomi smiled and said "Really, Mom? That's great! What is the answer?"
Samantha did not answer straight away. She just wrapped the towel around her small daughter's body and told her "Come out to the bedroom with me. I'll explain there."
Naomi nodded, smiling gleefully at her mother and walked with her to the main part of their quarters. Samantha led her daughter over to her bed. That was when Naomi noticed something was lying on top of it. When she got close enough, she picked it up and soon realized what it was.
"Mom, is this a diaper?" she asked anxiously.
Samantha slowly nodded her head. She anticipated that Naomi would react a little like this, but she told her "This is only temporary, sweetie. At least until we can figure out why you're having accidents, okay?"
Naomi stood thinking about this for a long while. Eventually, she agreed to her mother's request. "If you say so, Mom," was all she said.
"Would you like to put it on yourself, or do you want me to do it?" Samantha asked.
Naomi replied
145231121122.title: went to get her daughter

1452311211222.content:
Naomi replied "Can you do it, Mom? I don't really know how to put a diaper on."
Samantha just smiled her motherly smile and said "Of course I will, honey. After all, I changed your diapers not long ago."
Samantha picked up her young daughter and placed her gently on the bed. She unfolded the diaper and slid it carefully under her daughter's bottom. She brought the front of it up between Naomi's legs and fastened the tapes up nicely. After pressing her hands on the front of the diaper to make certain it was on correctly, she picked up Naomi and set her on her feet.
"How does it feel?" she asked her.
"It feels... great!" Naomi answered brightly, "It's pretty thick, though. I can barely even put my legs together."
"Let me see you walk in them," requested Samantha.
Naomi did her best to walk straight, but her diaper made her waddle around the room instead. Samantha just giggled and muttered to herself "So cute."
At that moment, Samantha's combadge beeped. A voice emanated from it "Janeway to Ensign Wildman. Come in, please."
Samantha quickly tapped her combadge and replied in her business tone "Wildman here, Captain. What is it?"
"We're about to begin those experiments with that anomaly we picked up an hour ago," the Captain replied, "We need you in Astrometrics in ten minutes."
"Alright, Captain," agreed Samantha, "I'll be there in five. Wildman out."
She tapped her combadge again and turned to Naomi, who was still trying to get used to her diaper.
"Naomi, sweetie, come here, please," Samantha sweetly asked her daughter.
Naomi smiled and waddled back over to her mother. Samantha knelt down and let Naomi walk into her open arms. She hugged her firmly and gave her small diapered bottom a few firm pats.
"I need to go to work now," said Samantha as they pulled apart, "Do you want to come with me or just hang out here for a while?"
Naomi stood thinking for a moment. On the one hand, she could accompany her mother to work. She knew her mother would be ralways enjoy her company as long as she did not interfere with the workload, but she was uncertain that she would want to go out into the hallways of the ship wearing diapers underneath her clothes. On the other hand, she could stay in their quarters without any need for clothes and just lounge around in her diapers, but she wouldn't have anyone to hang out with.
After some more consideration, Naomi told her mother that she would
1452311211222.title: "Can you do it?"

What kind of anomaly.

What if one day a female crewman wakes up and everything is different, every woman onboard is behaving like babies/toddlers, and everyone except this one person, be they man woman or computer believe this to all be normal. It’s up to this lone woman to find out what has happened to her crew and how to fix it, or remain one of starfleets cutests. Or maybe they already were all along

1453322212.content: Who gets abducted, the men or women?
1453322212.title: Abductions

14533222121.content:
(Note: in this universe, I decided to have Kes remain on board the ship. This is AU, after all.)

Captain Kathryn Janeway was on the bridge in her chair. She was reflecting on the events of the past few days. B'Elanna had given birth to her and Tom's baby girl Miral, Icheb had become the first person accepted into Starfleet Academy at such long-distance, and her crew was a little closer to home. She felt that things were looking better than ever before for her crew and the ship.

"Captain, I'm picking up a vessel about a light-year in front of us," Tuvok reported.

"Designation?" Janeway inquired.

"Unknown," reported Tuvok.

"It's definitely not the Borg, but it appears to be technologically superior to Voyager," reported Ensign Harry Kim.

"Heading, Tuvok?" said Janeway.

"They appear to be coming directly for the ship," replied the Vulcan.

"Tom, bring us closer to them," Janeway ordered the helmsman, "Try to stay as close to our present route as possible."

"You got it, Captain," Tom replied, making a slight adjustment to the ship's heading.

Before long, the Voyager reached the alien ship. Janeway had Harry send a standard greeting in all known languages. There was no response.

"It seems to be inactive," noted Tom.

"The Lieutenant is correct," stated Tuvok, "There are no indications of any life signs on board."

"But it halted its engines when we came within a certain distance of it," Harry pointed out, "How could a ship do that without a crew?"

"This could simply be a ship that is programmed to seek out ship's of other races, much like our own," theorized Tuvok.

"What do you think, Captain?" asked Chakotay "Should we investigate it or should we back off?"

Janeway sat thinking for a moment about their options. In the end, she decided they would
14533222121.title: the men

145332221212.content:
"Let's investigate," she decided, "It would be foolish to pass up an opportunity like this to learn more."

"As much as I'd love to search it, Captain, that might be a little difficult," stated Tom, "The shields are up. We cannot transport through."

"What about a shuttle craft?" queried Janeway

"I can detect no signs of any shuttle doors," Tuvok replied after a quick scan, "There does not seem to be a way to board it, either."

"Tom, bring us closer," Janeway ordered the Lieutenant, "There might we another way inside."

Paris brought the ship forward at bare minimum impulse. But just a few hundred meters later, the alien ship came to life.

In the span of no more than three seconds, the alien ship's engines were activated, its weapons were brought online, Voyager was targeted, and a powerful burst of energy was launched near Main Engineering.

The crew of Voyager was taken completely by surprise. Several people were knocked off their feet while others struggled to remain standing.

"Pull us back!" Janeway shouted hastily.

Lieutenant Paris did not need to be told twice. He reversed Voyager's heading. But just a few seconds later, Harry reported "Captain, two more ships just materialized behind us!"

Almost immediately after he said this, Voyager was hit from behind by another burst of energy.

"We're surrounded!" Tuvok shouted.

"Tuvok, get the weapons up!" Chakotay demanded.

"I'm afraid I cannot; that second blast disabled the phaser array and the photon torpedoes!" shouted Tuvok.

Janeway swore under her breath, thinking furiously about another alternative. Just then,
145332221212.title: investigate

1453322212121.content:
"Captain, I'm picking up signs of transporter activity!" yelled Harry, "They're trying to beam aboard the ship!"

"Shields up!" shouted Janeway.

"They're already up!" Harry informed her, "But they're still getting through!"

"Oh no," muttered Janeway, "Where are they mainly entering?"

"Main Engineering, Astrometrics, the Cargo Bay, and several hallways throughout decks 2-9!" said Harry, "Wait... Oh, God, they're coming onto the Bridge now!"

Just then, three armed figures materialized onto the Bridge. They were fully clad in black suits with gas masks covering their heads. Tuvok whipped out his phaser, but he was shot by one of the intruders.

"Red Alert!" shouted Janeway.

A burst of activity happened on the bridge. Everyone tried to arm themselves, but the figures were elusive. They drew some small canisters from their belts and dropped them onto the ground. Almost immediately, a greenish gas started emanating from them.

Every person on the bridge started coughing violently. It was not hard to determine that the gas was making them lose consciousness.

Before long, the gas was distributed throughout the entire ship and every single member of the crew slipped out of consciousness.

On the bridge, one the figures slowly approached Janeway's figure and remarked to the others "It appears we have a healthy find here. Let's get to work."

The others agreed.
1453322212121.title: the ship is boarded

choices: They have the computer locate everyone
14533222121212.content:
Hours later, Captain Janeway began to stir from her uneasy slumber. She coughed a few times and rubbed her eyes.
She began to look around herself. She realized that she was lying on the floor of the Bridge. Nothing about the room itself had changed. All the panels and equipment were still there. However, she quickly realized that Tuvok, Harry, Tom, and Chakotay were all gone.
She also felt a little cold for whatever reason.
She slowly sat up onto her knees, hearing a strange plastic-like crinkling sound. She paid no mind to that, though.
She reached up to tap her combadge. But she was not wearing it. In fact, she wasn't wearing her uniform shirt either. Janeway looked down and saw that to her horror, she was wearing nothing but a thick white disposable diaper.
Before she could react to this, she heard a groan coming from the other side of the room. She looked around and saw Crewman Tal Celes spread out on the ground. Like Janeway, the Bajoran crewman was clad in nothing but a diaper, as well.
Janeway walked over to her and helped her up, saying "Are you alright, Tal? Tal? Celes, are you okay?"
"Yes, Captain, thank you," responded the disoriented crewman as she got onto her feet. After a moment, she quickly realized that her uniform was gone and had been replaced with something most unusual. "Captain, what's going on?"
"I don't know, Tal," responded Janeway, "But we need to search the ship for the others."
"Couldn't we just have the computer locate everyone?" suggested Tal.
14533222121212.title: Hours later...

145332221212122.content:
"That's not a bad idea, Crewman," stated Janeway.
She looked up slightly and said "Computer, locate Commander Chakotay."
The computer took a moment, then responded "Commander Chakotay is not on board."
Tal and Janeway looked at each other nervously. Then Janeway said "Locate Lieutenant Tom Paris."
"Lieutenant Paris is not on board."
"Locate Ensign Harry Kim."
"Ensign Kim is not on board."
Tal and Janeway were seriously starting to become concerned.
Janeway then said "Locate Lieutenant B'Elanna Torres."
This time, the computer answered "Lieutenant Torres is in Main Engineering."
Tal and Janeway breathed a sigh of relief. Then Tal asked the computer "Is she conscious?"
"Negative," replied the Computer.
"We'll see to her later," Janeway decided, "Let's look up the crew manifest and run through it."
"Great idea, Captain," said Tal.
The two diapered women waddled over to the command module and brought up the crew manifest. They ran through every person on it.
In the end, they discovered that about half of the crew was gone and the other half was accounted for.
What really stood out was that only the female crew members were still on board; the male crew members had disappeared.
145332221212122.title: They have the computer locate everyone

info.brief_description: The female characters from everyone's favorite sci-fi franchise get diapered!
info.description:
Rules:

Keep the women in diapers (you can have some men in diapers, but the main focus is on the women).
No killing off main characters
Sex is okay, as long as it's not guy on guy.
No age regression, transformation, or vore. No growing/shrinking.

And most importantly:
Please make long chapters with decent grammar and spelling.
I want you to try to go into detail and make it vivid and lively.
So please try to make long chapters.
That includes you as well, CardinalPriest!

Give it your best!
